scripts.preinstall: npx only-allow pnpm && git config core.hooksPath .githooks
scripts.convert:xlsx: tsc pipeline/scripts/convertXlsxToCsv.ts --module nodenext --outDir dist/pipeline/scripts && node dist/pipeline/scripts/convertXlsxToCsv.js
scripts.build:boundaries: tsc pipeline/scripts/splitBoundaries.ts --module nodenext --outDir dist/pipeline/scripts && node dist/pipeline/scripts/splitBoundaries.js
scripts.prepare: pnpm run convert:xlsx && pnpm run build:data && pnpm run build:boundaries
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist public/assets/boundaries public/assets/districts.json public/assets/schools_by_district.json public/assets/prerender-slugs.json
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run prepare && astro build
